text: General (Rtd) Tan Sri Dato' Mohd Ghazali bin Mohd Seth (4 February 1929 â€“ 24 August 2021) was a Malaysian military personnel. He was the 7th Chief of Defence Forces of Malaysia from 1982 until 1985 when Mahathir Mohamad was the Prime Minister. He also was the Army chief from 1977 until 1982. He was born in Johor Bahru, Malaysia. Ghazali died on 24 August 2021 at a hospital in Kuala Lumpur from heart failure, aged 92. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Malaysian politicians Category:Asian military people Category:People from Johor
title: Ghazali Mohd Seth
